messages.title: When it comes to the General Election take a long, hard look at the Tories.
messages.content: My town seems a lot safer than it used to be. Now there are more police on the streets, you can see them walking around, on the beat.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will protect frontline police spending and pledge that your neighbourhood policing team spends at least 80 per cent of its time on the beat in your community.

issues.economy: I don’t think it’s a coincidence that more police has meant less crime.

endorsements.endorsement: My town seems a lot safer than it used to be. Now there are more police on the streets, you can see them walking around, on the beat.

quotes.text: I don’t think it’s a coincidence that more police has meant less crime.
